introduction: SYNOPSISChang-gil, vows to start a new life after he's released from prison. He meets Choon-ja, a prostitute, and is attracted to her. Bulldog, Chang-gil's former boss during his criminal days, urges Chang-gil to return to the organization but Chang-gil resists him. Bulldog plans to frame Chang-gil but Chang-gil, out of anger, kills him and makes it look like involuntary manslaughter. Choon-ja believes Chang-gil's story and leaves with him. At first, she is after his money but she begins to genuinely care for him. But nobody is willing to help a convicted criminal and a prostitute on the run from the police back in his hometown. They are saddened by reality and decide to have their own small wedding.故事曾经是贩毒囚犯的张先生出走后，设计了新的生活。对他来说，这样一个妓女正在接近她，她有一种被拖慢的感觉。与此同时，曾经担任过张学历老大的斗牛犬强迫张在一个组织工作，但他拒绝了。愤怒的斗牛犬陷入陷阱，愤怒的建设者因为疏忽而杀死斗牛犬。Chunja知道，在1971年12月31日，窗口长度过失杀人与他逃脱，只看到他的第一chunja naseotji与窗口长度一大笔钱，他发现自己越来越爱他。那些正在被警方追捕的人现在远未结束。所以他们终于找到自己的家乡，但没有人在家里欢迎他们。在他们的前囚和妓女悲惨的现实面前，他们感到悲伤，而不是愤怒，并提出自己的婚礼仪式。
